name: sonos-alexa-api
description: Modern Sonos HTTP API for Alexa integration

scripts.dev:log: NODE_OPTIONS="--openssl-legacy-provider" dotenv -- tsx watch src/server.ts 2>&1 | tee logs/test-output.log
scripts.test:log: npm run build && bash -c 'tsx test/run-tests.ts "$@" 2>&1 | tee logs/test-output.log' --
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && tsx test/run-tests.ts -- integration/**/*-tests.ts
scripts.test:playback: npm run build && tsx test/run-tests.ts -- unit/playback-tests.ts integration/playback-tests.ts
scripts.test:volume: npm run build && tsx test/run-tests.ts -- unit/volume-tests.ts
scripts.test:groups: npm run build && tsx test/run-tests.ts -- integration/group-tests.ts

author: Shane Hartman <shartman@nx.bogometer.com> and Claude (Anthropic)
